mixed-citation.article-title: An updated classification of the jumping plant-lice (Hemiptera: Psylloidea) integrating molecular and morphological evidence

tp:treatment-sec.p: Phacoseminae Kieffer, 1906: 387 (the substitute name Phacopteronidae is maintained according to the ICZN 1999/2012, article 40.2).

The Phacopteroninae is strongly supported as a monophylum in both mtg trees and morphologically ( Heslop-Harrison 1958 ; White & Hodkinson 1985 ). The subfamily corresponds to the concept of Burckhardt & Ouvrard (2012) . The genera are poorly defined and their phylogenetic relationships are unknown.
